companyName: Pimco 15 Year U.S. TIPS Index Exchange-Traded Fund
description:
The investment seeks to provide total return that closely corresponds, before fees and expenses, to the total return of the ICE BofAML 15+ Year US Inflation-Linked Treasury Index.
 The fund invests at least 80% of its total assets (exclusive of collateral held from securities lending) in the component securities of the ICE BofAML 15+ Year US Inflation-Linked Treasury Index (the "underlying index"). The underlying index is an unmanaged index comprised of Treasury Inflation-Protected Securities ("TIPS") with a maturity of at least 15 years.
